list.abs: and he found a new jawbone of an ass , and put , and took it , and slew a thousand men therewith .他见一块未乾的驴腮骨，就伸手拾起来，用以击杀一千人。
After crocodilian close therewith , rise this month reach the 4 th ., 鳄鱼紧随其后 , 本月升至第四名.
therewith Islamic reform would not only realize self-perfect and also promote profound social changes in Middle East .伊斯兰宗教改革不仅能实现自我完善，还必将推动中东地区深刻的社会变革。
thereupon the entire class applauded ; with that , she left the room ; I therewith withdraw my complaints .整个班随即鼓起了掌；她随即离开了那个房间；我随即收回了我的抱怨。

sentences.sentence: "thy slanders I forgive; and therewithal remit thy other forfeits"- Shakespeare
